attributes.description:
This epic GODZILLA NISSAN GT-R BLACK EDITION is up for grabs! loaded with tons of extras such as -


blacked out rims, auto xenon headlights,side skirts ,front and rear parking sensors ,LED daytime running lights ,Recaro sport bucket seats,multi function steering wheel ,cruise control ,Bluetooth ,push button start/stop,paddle shift ,dual climate control ,carbon fiber interior trim ,touch screen media interface ,navigation ,red interior stitching ,reverse camera,Front bumper, fenders, mirrors vps ,Keyless entry,Electric folding mirrors,20inch volk racing rims,Brembo brakes, Heated front seats,Sports suspension ,Welcome door shadow lights,Semi electric,seats ,Navigation and more!





Performance upgrades with NXGEN - Performance Specialists



800hp capable build

- Catless down pipes

- Racing y-pipe

- Upgraded Stage 1 turbos with actuators

- Upgraded fuel injectors

- Upgraded ethanol compatible fuel pumps

- Flex fuel kit

- Mapping for Flex fuel done with ECUTEK

- 3” Cobb induction kit

60039256
